Package trashday

Provides the core application logic of the Alexa skill called "Trash Day".

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TrashDayManager
    Handles the core application logic.
    TrashDaySpeechlet
    Handles routing session requests to the appropriate TrashDayManager methods.
    TrashDaySpeechletRequestStreamHandler
    Ensure the Alexa request is intended for our service and pass it on to our TrashDaySpeechlet.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CoberturaIgnore
    Create a method annotation to allow us to ignore some methods from our Cobertura reporting.

Package trashday Description

Provides the core application logic of the Alexa skill called "Trash Day". It manages Alexa's request/response voice user interface and appropriately stores and modifies the user's weekly pickup Schedule in the Alexa Session and the Dynamo DB.
Author:
J. Todd Baldwin
See Also:
Alexa Skills Kit Docs: Handling Requests Sent by Alexa
